sentence.Network_en: This will silence the slaveholder, when he says where is your love for the slave?
sentence.Network_cn: 奴隶们想对我们说:你们对奴隶的爱到哪儿去了?

list.abs: to close territory to slaves , Taney said , violated the constitutional rights of slaveholding citizens . therefore , the Missouri Compromise was unconstitutional .特尼说，向奴隶关闭大门违反了奴隶主的宪法权利，因此，密苏里妥协法案是违宪的，国会没有权利在各地的奴隶制问题上采取行动。
slaves and slaveholders polarization and the majority of the people miserable .奴隶和奴隶主两极分化，大多数人民群众苦不堪言。
so the slaveholder increases by slave-breeding sum of his values of exchange , but he ruins the forces of future generations .因此奴隶主由于奴隶的繁殖，他所占有的交换价值有了增加，但后代的生产力却被他所毁灭。
when you hear a slaveholder preach about his individual liberty and his rights , you sometimes wonder , " Come on , where do you get off ? "当你听见一个奴隶主鼓吹，他的个人自由和他的个人权利时，你有时候会想，"拜托，你是怎么做的呢"
